MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY21 postcode area of Berriew, affecting properties in Berriew and surrounding areas. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30PM, due to the repairs required to a grounded overhead line. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:35PM on 10th April 2021.
